game_info.name: Minishoot Adventures Clone
game_info.description: Twin-stick shooter adventure with Zelda-style exploration, dungeons, and bullet-hell combat.

core_loop.description: Explore open world, fight enemies with twin-stick combat, collect XP/items, defeat bosses.

primary_action.description: Arrow keys or click to shoot in direction

combat_profile.how_to_attack: WASD to move, Arrow keys or mouse to shoot in direction. Shift to dash, Space for supershot.
